title: Preparation of a biochar-lignosulfonate composite material and its adsorption performance for Cu2+
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22335-22343
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00588K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ying Zhang, Qi He, Yonglin Yang, Qian Bai
Biochar was prepared using peanut shells as raw materials, and then composite amino-functionalized lignosulfonate was used to prepare a biochar/lignosulfonate adsorbent (BC-CLS).
